message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,150,000.

I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,000,000. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $1,075,000, but I'd love to see if we can get even closer to the price I'm looking for.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and counteroffer. However, the value of this product is significantly higher than your proposed price.  I'm willing to come down to $1,120,000. This reflects the true worth of what's being offered.

I understand that you think the product is worth a lot, but I've done my research and I believe it's not worth more than $1,050,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm offering $1,075,000, but I'm not willing to go any higher than that. Can we meet in the middle at $1,062,500?
